extendedInfo.description: Accurate text input in any language you need. Specially optimized for SlovoEd dictionary.New! Layouts: QWERTY, AZERTY, Cyrillic.Supported languages: Catal, Dutch, Eng, Fren, Germ, Greek, Ital, Polish, Portug, Rus, Span, Turk.Activation: long press â123â at Standard keyboard -> Select Input Method -> Paragon keyboard.

reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on Android 2.1, but lacks word suggestions. Ability to switch between 2 layouts sweetens the deal, though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: \320\244\320\233\320\220\320\237 in Greek, \320\250\320\233\320\225\320\224 in Cyrillic: If having trouble, I went into Settings, find Keyboard & put a check. Then long press on Google & change input method
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Smooth switching between languages. Somehow it doesn\'t look all that great on a tablet;  probably it is rather intended for a phone. When typing, one can see only a small portion of the text, not the whole page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s actually very good! You long-touch a text field, select it as input method, then you long-touch \"?123\" and select your language from settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: garbage app
reviews.comment: Total garbage. No instructions. I am not sure how to activate it. People who designed it could not provide simple instructions. Will uninstall. Disappointed big time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: As a Russian student this is very useful. It doesn\'t scale up properly for larger phones, but perfectly useful. Allow keys to vibrate?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: ALT key lets you switch between western and cyrillic alphabet w/o changing input method. (works fine on NexusOne)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I wouldn\'t be without it...
reviews.comment: I love this app! It may not have a large number of language options, but it is simple to use and it gives you easy access to the Greek and Cyrillic alphabets - which is all I need.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: As a dutch belgian i need an azerty layout but certainly not a french os. Problem solved with this app! Azerty with an english os!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The keyboard is small and the dictionary is not very good. I don\'t know why it id so difficult to make a keyboard as responsive as my ipod touch
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I don\'t know what all the fuss is. It does what it says. Learn to use your phones before you invent problems with an app people!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: works great with Greek keyboard on my Magic which is what I have been looking for! Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If there is no Russian keyboard: goto Settings menu, Locale & Text, check Paragon keyboard. To use it: long press input field and change Input Method
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keys very small but (contrary to the default keyboard on Hero) lets you hold to adjust which key you\'re hitting. Has Russian letters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very handy for typing Russian. Easy to switch to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: extremely simple, great to use!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work and made my phone slow and glitchy. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: the option already shows on my main setting, but there\'s nothing on my message setting. galaxy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work. Tried it on droid x. Don\'t waste your time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keyboard designed for small screens. Doesn\'t stretch on galaxy tab. Its hanging in center obscuring input field
reviews.author: A Google User
